assets.name: D'Kora Marauder
assets.promptUsed:
MANDATORY STYLE GUIDE:
Material & Texture: The spaceship must look like a handmade physical model made of plasticine clay with a subtle comic-like shader. Realistic metallic hull texture with a non-glossy, soft clay finish. High-end stop-motion animation quality (Laika/Aardman style). Very detailed panel lines, windows, and technical details.
Proportions (CRUCIAL - FOLLOW EXACTLY): Accurate to the ship class design. Maintain correct proportions and EXACT number of components as specified.
Lighting: Soft, cinematic studio lighting that emphasizes the clay texture and model quality. No harsh digital shine. Subtle glow from windows and engines.
Composition: Isometric view, approximately 30 degrees from above, ship facing toward bottom-left corner of frame, showing top and port side detail.
Background: Solid black background (#000000).
Details: Glowing windows, engine glow, subtle weathering, Ferengi faction markings, weapon arrays visible.


FERENGI D'KORA MARAUDER: CRESCENT MOON / HORSESHOE shape - curved main body with OPEN CENTER. Bridge pod at one end. Orange/copper hull. This is the SIGNATURE Ferengi warship shape. Reference: TNG Ferengi Marauder.

FERENGI DESIGN: Commerce-focused. More cargo space than weapons. Shield-heavy for protecting goods. Not designed for war.

Subject: Single Ferengi military warship, D'Kora Marauder class. 
Design Language: Crescent/horseshoe shape, ear-like structures, ornate golden decorations
Color Scheme: Orange, gold, bronze, copper, warm metallic tones

CRITICAL RULES:
1. Follow the EXACT GEOMETRY specified above
2. Do NOT add extra nacelles or components
3. Do NOT add double saucers - only ONE saucer section per ship
4. Count components carefully before generating

**single spacecraft miniature model, rendered in high-quality stylized claymation 3D style, game asset**
--no funny, thumbprints, exaggerated features, multiple ships, fleet, grid, shiny plastic, CGI look, action figure, base, stand, table surface, tilt-shift, blurry background, frame, border, text, label, pedestal, extra engines, wrong number of nacelles, double saucer, two saucers, stacked hulls

Material & Texture: The spaceship must look like a handmade physical model made of plasticine clay with a subtle comic-like shader. Realistic metallic hull texture with a non-glossy, soft clay finish. High-end stop-motion animation quality (Laika/Aardman style). Very detailed panel lines, windows, and technical details.
Proportions (CRUCIAL - FOLLOW EXACTLY): Accurate to the ship class design. Maintain correct proportions and EXACT number of components as specified.
Lighting: Soft, cinematic studio lighting that emphasizes the clay texture and model quality. No harsh digital shine. Subtle glow from windows and engines.
Composition: Isometric view, approximately 30 degrees from above, ship facing toward bottom-left corner of frame, showing top and port side detail.
Background: Solid black background (#000000).
Details: Glowing windows, engine glow, subtle weathering, Ferengi faction markings, weapon arrays visible.


Generic FERENGI vessel. Orange-copper hull. Design VARIES: Military/Marauders are CRESCENT-shaped, cargo ships are BOXY, yachts are SLEEK. Ferengi prioritize PROFIT over uniform aesthetics.

FERENGI DESIGN: Commerce-focused. More cargo space than weapons. Shield-heavy for protecting goods. Not designed for war.

Subject: Single Ferengi military warship, Bounty Hunter class. 
Design Language: Crescent/horseshoe shape, ear-like structures, ornate golden decorations
Color Scheme: Orange, gold, bronze, copper, warm metallic tones

CRITICAL RULES:
1. Follow the EXACT GEOMETRY specified above
2. Do NOT add extra nacelles or components
3. Do NOT add double saucers - only ONE saucer section per ship
4. Count components carefully before generating

**single spacecraft miniature model, rendered in high-quality stylized claymation 3D style, game asset**
--no funny, thumbprints, exaggerated features, multiple ships, fleet, grid, shiny plastic, CGI look, action figure, base, stand, table surface, tilt-shift, blurry background, frame, border, text, label, pedestal, extra engines, wrong number of nacelles, double saucer, two saucers, stacked hulls
